7.20.20  11:06 pm   Isn't 'prehistoric' a weird term?

     
'Pre' meaning before and 'historic' referring to history.
So 'before history' makes no sense. The fact that things happened in 'prehistoric' times means that it was part of history. Wouldn't history start when time start?
